title: Iwan of the Mosque of al-Maridani
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosquée el-Mârdâni L'iwan princip. Mosque of el-Mâridâni. Translation of photographer's description: Mârdâni Mosque Main Iwan - Collector's note: Mardani (mosquée) Iwan est pendant travaux. Translation of note: Mârdâni Mosque Main Iwan - Mardani (mosque) East Iwan during works.
location: Ad Darb al Aḩmar; Cairo; Egypt
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
